[DQC.US.0126.9590] The statement 00000007 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows (Unaudited) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities of -2,699,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -3,177,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-03-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities that should add to -2,699,000 are comprised of the following:
- FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments 344,000 - PaymentsOfDividends 1,210,000 - PaymentsOfLoanCosts 28,000 + ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised 244,000 + ProceedsFromWarrantExercises 11,582,000 - RepaymentsOfBankDebt 15,028,000 - RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt 802,000 - RepaymentsOfNotesPayable 801,000 + PPPLoanForgiveness -478,000 + ProceedsFromFinancingLiability 3,688,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 00000007 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows (Unaudited). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities Total Value : -2,699,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-03-31 Dimensions : Decimals of Total: -3 Unit of Total: USD Rule Element Id:9590 Rule version: 17.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1721741/000149315221015375/lazy-20210331.xml 2863

property.name: label
property.value: Net cash used in financing activities

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0126.9590] The statement 00000007 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows (Unaudited) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept us-gaap:AdjustmentsToReconcileNetIncomeLossToCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities of 15,979,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 3,521,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-03-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of us-gaap:AdjustmentsToReconcileNetIncomeLossToCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 15,979,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium 43,000 + AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets 1,281,000 + DepreciationAndAmortization 1,944,000 + FairValueAdjustmentOfWarrants -6,468,000 - GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment 3,000 + IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilities 4,799,000 + IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesPayableNetOfIncomeTaxesReceivable 5,477,000 - IncreaseDecreaseInInventories -6,946,000 - IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets 49,000 - IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpenseAndOtherAssets 737,000 - IncreaseDecreaseInReceivables 10,343,000 + ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts 2,000 + ShareBasedCompensation 372,000 + InducementLossOnWarrantConversion 246,000 - NoncashLeaseExpenses -11,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 00000007 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows (Unaudited). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : us-gaap:AdjustmentsToReconcileNetIncomeLossToCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities Total Value : 15,979,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-03-31 Dimensions : Decimals of Total: -3 Unit of Total: USD Rule Element Id:9590 Rule version: 17.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1721741/000149315221015375/lazy-20210331.xml 2835

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0126.9590] The statement 00000004 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Statements of Income (Unaudited) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense of -8,102,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 4,834,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-03-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense that should add to -8,102,000 are comprised of the following:
- FairValueAdjustmentOfWarrants -6,468,000 - InterestExpense 1,866,000 - InducementLossOnWarrantConversion 246,000 - PPPLoanForgiveness -478,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 00000004 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Statements of Income (Unaudited). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
